name: Fire Car Stunts Fly
description:
Fire Car Stunts Fly is an awesome new 3D Flying Flight Simulation game.This game looks pretty funny and interesting, because where else can you see the flying machine on the old engine of the future.
Realistic graphics will help even more to experience flight in a flying Truck.
This game is for all ages who like to do advantures. infect your kids also love this game.
Time travel to the future, be the extreme pilot of the flying lorry.
